    • reset

      public void reset()
      When scan a token, return to the begin.

    • nextState

      public String nextState(char now, char lookahead)
      Now in state, and want to go an edge which is now. If not an edge is now, return error. If lookahead is not exist or lookahead is $, accept this token. And return the token type. Else return notYet.
      参数:
      now - the edge charactor
      lookahead - the lookahead charactor
      返回:
      the dealing result "error", token type or "notYet"

    • isStart

      public boolean isStart()
      check state is state or not
      返回:
      boolean, is or not
